building.name: Cisco Spaces HQ (Demo Tower)
building.address: 170 W Tasman Dr, San Jose, CA

floors.label: Lobby & Visitor Pavilion
floors.purpose: Reception, visitor management, cafe, experience center
floors.notes: Hosts daily executive briefings and high-volume cafe traffic.

floors.label: Collaboration Hub (Under Renovation)
floors.purpose: Agile project rooms and large briefing studio
floors.notes: Construction crews modernizing briefing studio; sensors stay online for safety compliance.
floors.restrictions: Hard-hat access, max 10 people per hour.

floors.label: Innovation & Engineering Pods
floors.purpose: Software engineering, hack spaces, UX labs
floors.notes: Hosts rotating hackathons; busiest Tues–Thu afternoons.

floors.label: Customer Experience Center
floors.notes: Peak demand around on-site trainings; steady but moderate.
floors.restrictions: Escort visitors outside of demo zones.

floors.label: Executive Offices (CXOs only)
floors.notes: Badge restricted; typically empty on weekends and evenings.
